thread.section_title: Hilton Paris La Defense - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Outstanding Service
thread.title_full: Outstanding Service - Review of Hilton Paris La Defense, La Defense, France - TripAdvisor

author: Michael P
title: Outstanding Service
text:
I arrived early, so the room was not ready, but the terrific front desk staff checked me to expedite the process & then held my luggage while I went exploring the city. When I returned later in the day, the room was as described. It was clean, quiet and comfortable.
The breakfast omelette was quite good, albeit a bit slow. If made for order omelettes are important to you I recommend going early before the crowds. Plenty of good lunch dinner options nearby with a variety of price points. I am glad I came back to this hotel.
Room Tip: Most of the rooms face into the building, a few over look the plaza. See more room tips
